properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/agent-QVq5tY47wq-DEFAULT'
| stats count() as invocations by bin(5m)
| sort @timestamp desc
properties.title: Invocation Rate (5min bins)

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/agent-QVq5tY47wq-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /Invocation completed/
| parse @message /Invocation completed successfully \((?<duration>[0-9.]+)s\)/
| stats avg(duration) as avg_latency, max(duration) as max_latency, pct(duration, 95) as p95_latency by bin(5m)
properties.title: Performance Metrics (seconds)

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/agent-QVq5tY47wq-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /ERROR/ or @message like /error/ or @message like /failed/
| stats count() as error_count by bin(5m)
properties.title: Error Rate (5min bins)

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/agent-QVq5tY47wq-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /ERROR/
| fields @timestamp, @message
| sort @timestamp desc
| limit 10
properties.title: Recent Errors

properties.query:
SOURCE '/aws/bedrock-agentcore/runtimes/agent-QVq5tY47wq-DEFAULT'
| filter @message like /Invocation completed/
| parse @message /Invocation completed successfully \((?<duration>[0-9.]+)s\)/
| stats avg(duration) as avg_duration_seconds, max(duration) as max_duration_seconds, min(duration) as min_duration_seconds
properties.title: Overall Performance Summary
